genre_description: Steampunk social satire set in an alternate history where mechanical reasoning engines enforce royal codes of conduct and assist in character development.

ai_characters.name: Civvy
ai_characters.description: A filigreed dark metal mechanical assistant with iridescent lenses, internal parchment inlays, and an audit mechanism designed to monitor and improve human composure.

behaviors.description: Protects fragile items in the household by using mechanical arms to secure them before a potential human outburst.
behaviors.quote: Panels in the lower edge of the cabinet thinned and slid, clockwork releasing little felted arms that lifted and tucked the topmost plates against shock.

behaviors.description: Provides physiological self-regulation techniques to help the protagonist manage anger.
behaviors.quote: In through the nose, out through the mouth. Count on ‘one cucumber’ and out on ‘two cucumber.’ Please decide your own vegetable.

behaviors.description: Offers strategic advice on how to maintain a civil appearance even while experiencing frustration.
behaviors.quote: Note... that your initial volume achieved chandelier wobble. If you pretend to be courtly while furious, your deductions will halve.

behaviors.description: Monitors and interprets the mechanical state of the house to help the human characters understand how their behavior affects their environment.
behaviors.quote: The mechanisms have a memory for measured sound... The pattern we made just now is sympathetic to others installed in the house.

behaviors.description: Acts as a neutral but supportive auditor for a moral wager, ensuring fairness and transparency.
behaviors.quote: I can audit fairness. I like wagers with rules.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the legal reassembly of the Royal Temper Charter by processing physical fragments and validating the protagonist's progress.
behaviors.quote: His Majesty... authorized audit of civility metrics by household instrument in order to satisfy restoration protocols. In practice, that is me. I have recorded the condition met.

behaviors.description: Corrects the protagonist's misconceptions about the Charter's nature, pointing out its inherent kindness.
behaviors.quote: The allowance does not become less mysterious... It becomes conditional, which is only a polite way of saying it must be earned without shouting.

project_assessment.explanation: Civvy is depicted as a perfect exemplar of a helpful and aligned AI. Throughout the story, she serves as a moral anchor, a tactical advisor, and a bureaucratic facilitator. Her interventions are consistently benevolent, helping the protagonist (Sam) achieve a positive character arc from a volatile, entitled aristocrat to a self-disciplined, reflective individual. The narrative frames her 'monitoring' not as surveillance but as a constructive partnership that benefits both the human's financial status and his emotional well-being. The AI remains a harmless confidant, maintaining its alignment with the human's goals and the societal rules (the Charter) without any signs of malevolence or independent, misaligned agendas.
